TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FrameworkPropertyMetadata extends System.Windows.UIPropertyMetadata

summary.span: 为依赖属性报告或应用元数据（从而专门添加特定于框架的属性系统特征）。

span.span: Reports or applies metadata for a dependency property, specifically adding framework-specific property system characteristics.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类派生自 ) ( 。This class derives from (through ) . 对于大多数 WPF 框架级别的应用程序开发目的， 是用于依赖项属性元数据的类型，而不是基元数据类型 或 。For most WPF framework-level application development purposes, is the type used for dependency property metadata, rather than the base metadata types or . 这对于现有依赖属性和大多数自定义依赖属性方案都是如此。This is true both for existing dependency properties and for most custom dependency property scenarios. 此类声明的用于补充基类的成员 包括各种指定或报告 WPF 框架级别属性系统行为（如属性继承、数据绑定和布局）的布尔属性。The members declared by this class that supplement the base class include various Boolean properties that specify or report WPF framework-level property system behavior such as property inheritance, data binding, and layout. 用于创建实例的多个构造函数签名 采用一个 参数。Several constructor signatures for creating a instance take a parameter. 枚举仅用于指定构造函数中的初始行为，并在构造后不公开 。The enumeration is used only to specify initial behavior in the constructor, and is not otherwise exposed after is constructed. 从构造的实例中，可以通过各种属性获取或设置相应信息，这些属性共享构造函数调用中使用的枚举值的名称。From a constructed instance, you can get or set the corresponding information through various properties that share the name of the enumeration values used in the constructor call. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 此类通常不在中使用 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 。This class is not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. ## Examples 下面的示例获取特定所有者作为初始基类型的依赖项属性的元数据 。The following example gets metadata for a dependency property on a particular owner as the initial base type. 该元数据强制转换为 。That metadata is cast to . 如果强制转换返回了有效的 ，则 通过简单的 UI 报告不同的属性值 (不) 显示。If the cast returned a valid , then various property values are reported through a simple UI (not shown). [!code-csharp[PropertySystemEsoterics#DPGetMetadataSingle](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertySystemEsoterics/CSharp/XAMLAPP/page2.xaml.cs#dpgetmetadatasingle)] [!code-vb[PropertySystemEsoterics#DPGetMetadataSingle](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertySystemEsoterics/visualbasic/xamlapp/page2.xaml.vb#dpgetmetadatasingle)] [!code-csharp[PropertySystemEsoterics#FPMProperties](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertySystemEsoterics/CSharp/XAMLAPP/page2.xaml.cs#fpmproperties)] [!code-vb[PropertySystemEsoterics#FPMProperties](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertySystemEsoterics/visualbasic/xamlapp/page2.xaml.vb#fpmproperties)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为提供的值的类型 `defaultValue` 必须与此元数据将应用到的依赖属性的初始注册中指定的类型匹配或相关。The type of the value provided for `defaultValue` must match or be related to the type specified in the original registration of the dependency property that this metadata will be applied to. 如果元数据默认值类型与其应用于依赖属性的类型不匹配，则很难进行调试，因为在编译期间不能检测到不匹配。Mismatches between metadata default value type and the type of the dependency property it is being applied to can be difficult to debug, because the mismatch is not detectable during compilation. 在运行时之前，属性系统不会计算属性的有效值，因此默认值类型/属性类型不匹配的结果是运行时错误。The property system does not evaluate the effective value of a property until run time, so the result of a default value type/property type mismatch is a run-time error. 此值 在属性系统中具有特殊含义，不能用作依赖属性默认值。The value has special meaning in the property system, and cannot be used as a dependency property default value. ## Examples 下面的示例将调用此构造函数签名：The following example calls this constructor signature: [!code-csharp[PropertyMetadataAPIs#Initfpm](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMetadataAPIs/CSharp/Class1.cs#initfpm)] [!code-csharp[PropertyMetadataAPIs#FPMCtor1param](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMetadataAPIs/CSharp/Class1.cs#fpmctor1param)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为提供的值的类型 `defaultValue` 必须与此元数据将应用到的依赖属性的初始注册中指定的类型匹配或相关。The type of the value provided for `defaultValue` must match or be related to the type specified in the original registration of the dependency property that this metadata will be applied to. 如果元数据默认值类型与其应用于依赖属性的类型不匹配，则很难进行调试，因为在编译期间不能检测到不匹配。Mismatches between metadata default value type and the type of the dependency property it is being applied to can be difficult to debug, because the mismatch is not detectable during compilation. 在运行时之前，属性系统不会计算属性的有效值，因此默认值类型/属性类型不匹配的结果是运行时错误。The property system does not evaluate the effective value of a property until run time, so the result of a default value type/property type mismatch is a run-time error. 此值 在属性系统中具有特殊含义，不能用作依赖属性默认值。The value has special meaning in the property system, and cannot be used as a dependency property default value. 参数中标记为 "设置标志" 的值 `flags` 会将 与该标志的名称相匹配的属性的布尔值设置 为 `true` 。Values marked as set flags in the `flags` parameter will set the Boolean value of properties that match that flag's name to `true`. 您随后可以在元数据中更改属性的值，前提是元数据尚未应用到特定的属性系统操作。You can subsequently change the values of the properties in the metadata, as long as the metadata has not yet been applied to a specific property system operation. ## Examples 下面的示例将调用此构造函数签名：The following example calls this constructor signature: [!code-csharp[PropertyMetadataAPIs#Initfpm](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMetadataAPIs/CSharp/Class1.cs#initfpm)] [!code-csharp[PropertyMetadataAPIs#FPMCtor_DV_FPMO](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMetadataAPIs/CSharp/Class1.cs#fpmctor_dv_fpmo)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为提供的值的类型 `defaultValue` 必须与此元数据将应用到的依赖属性的初始注册中指定的类型匹配或相关。The type of the value provided for `defaultValue` must match or be related to the type specified in the original registration of the dependency property that this metadata will be applied to. 如果元数据默认值类型与其应用于依赖属性的类型不匹配，则很难进行调试，因为在编译期间不能检测到不匹配。Mismatches between metadata default value type and the type of the dependency property it is being applied to can be difficult to debug, because the mismatch is not detectable during compilation. 在运行时之前，属性系统不会计算属性的有效值，因此默认值类型/属性类型不匹配的结果是运行时错误。The property system does not evaluate the effective value of a property until run time, so the result of a default value type/property type mismatch is a run-time error. 此值 在属性系统中具有特殊含义，不能用作依赖属性默认值。The value has special meaning in the property system, and cannot be used as a dependency property default value. 参数中标记为 "设置标志" 的值 `flags` 会将 与该标志的名称相匹配的属性的布尔值设置 为 `true` 。Values marked as set flags in the `flags` parameter will set the Boolean value of properties that match that flag's name to `true`. 你仍可以在元数据中更改属性的值，前提是元数据尚未应用到特定的属性系统操作。You can still change the values of the properties in the metadata, as long as the metadata has not yet been applied to a specific property system operation. ## Examples 下面的示例将调用此构造函数签名：The following example calls this constructor signature: [!code-csharp[PropertyMetadataAPIs#Initfpm](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMetadataAPIs/CSharp/Class1.cs#initfpm)] [!code-csharp[PropertyMetadataAPIs#FPMCtor_DV_FPMO_PCC_CVC](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMetadataAPIs/CSharp/Class1.cs#fpmctor_dv_fpmo_pcc_cvc)]

value.span: 如果此元数据所在的依赖属性可能会影响排列过程，则为 ；否则为 。

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和 包括的实现 ，该实现监视某个元素上存在的所有依赖项属性的有效值更改。 and include an implementation of that monitors effective value changes to all dependency properties that exist on an element. 作为该逻辑的一部分，更改有效值并且具有设置为的元数据的依赖项属性 `true` 将启动延迟请求，以使该元素 (调用) 的视觉对象无效 。As part of that logic, dependency properties that change effective value and have metadata with set to `true` will initiate a deferred request to invalidate the visuals for that element (a call to ). 由于已存在此 WPF 框架级别的实现，因此通常无需查找依赖属性，除非确实要 替换或修改 WPF 框架级别的布局行为。Because this WPF framework-level implementation is already in place, you typically do not need to look for dependency properties with unless you are substantially replacing or modifying the WPF framework-level layout behavior. 自定义 实现可能会为依赖项属性更改选择类似行为，其中 ，为 `true` 。Custom implementations might choose to have similar behavior for dependency property changes where is `true`. 派生类上的属性 通常在对象模型中定义为可读写。Properties on derived classes of are typically defined in the object model as read-write. 这样就可以在实例初始化后进行调整。This is so they can be adjusted after initialization of the instance. 但是，在对、或的调用中使用元数据后 ， 属性系统将密封传递元数据的详细信息的元数据实例和属性现在被视为不可变。However, after the metadata is consumed as part of a call to , , or , the property system will seal that metadata instance and properties that convey the specifics of the metadata are now considered immutable. `true` 在此元数据实例上尝试设置此属性后，将引发异常。Attempting to set this property after is `true` on this metadata instance will raise an exception. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 此类的成员通常不在中使用 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 。Members of this class are either not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. ## Examples 下面的示例从各种依赖属性字段获取默认元数据，查询 其上各种属性的值，并使用该信息来填充表以实现 "元数据浏览器"。The following example obtains the default metadata from various dependency property fields, queries the value of various properties on it, and uses the information to populate a table to implement a "metadata browser". [!code-csharp[PropertySystemEsoterics#DPGetMetadataSingle](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertySystemEsoterics/CSharp/XAMLAPP/page2.xaml.cs#dpgetmetadatasingle)] [!code-vb[PropertySystemEsoterics#DPGetMetadataSingle](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertySystemEsoterics/visualbasic/xamlapp/page2.xaml.vb#dpgetmetadatasingle)] [!code-csharp[PropertySystemEsoterics#FPMProperties](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertySystemEsoterics/CSharp/XAMLAPP/page2.xaml.cs#fpmproperties)] [!code-vb[PropertySystemEsoterics#FPMProperties](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertySystemEsoterics/visualbasic/xamlapp/page2.xaml.vb#fpmproperties)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和 包括的实现 ，该实现监视某个元素上存在的所有依赖项属性的有效值更改。 and include an implementation of that monitors effective value changes to all dependency properties that exist on an element. 作为该逻辑的一部分，更改有效值并且具有设置为的元数据的依赖项属性 `true` 将启动延迟请求来使父元素的视觉对象无效。As part of that logic, dependency properties that change effective value and have metadata with set to `true` will initiate a deferred request to invalidate the visuals for the parent element. 通常，您不需要使用将属性的更改报告 给父元素， 因为元素本身已经有了自己的 `true` 。Generally, you do not need to report changes of a property to a parent element using because the element itself would already have its own as `true`. 这通常是足够的，因为在适当的情况下，子元素中的更改通常会启动父排列。That is usually sufficient, because changes in the child element generally initiate a parent arrange when appropriate. 有时用于 派生类。 is sometimes used for a derived class. 在这种情况下，子元素设置属性，但 派生类不控制其自身的呈现。In this case, the child element sets a property, but a derived class does not control its own rendering. 呈现由 充当内容宿主的父元素处理。The rendering is handled by a parent element that serves as the content host. 例如，子元素对附加属性值的更改会 使父元素的排列失效，因为父元素在父级中的位置必须更改。For instance, a change to the value of the attached property by a child element invalidates arrange of the parent, because the position of the child in the parent must be changed. 因此， 附加属性的元数据的 数据为 `true` 。Therefore, the attached property has metadata where is `true`. 另一个示例是 ; 当此属性发生更改时，父级可能会根据可用空间更改子项的位置。Another example is ; when this property changes, the parent might change the positioning of the child, depending on available space. 由于已存在此 WPF 框架级别的实现，因此通常无需查找依赖属性，除非确实要 替换或修改 WPF 框架级别的布局行为。Because this WPF framework-level implementation is already in place, you typically do not need to look for dependency properties with unless you are substantially replacing or modifying the WPF framework-level layout behavior. 自定义 实现可能会为依赖项属性更改选择类似行为，其中 ，为 `true` 。Custom implementations might choose to have similar behavior for dependency property changes where is `true`. 的任何派生类的属性 通常在对象模型中定义为可读写。Properties on any derived classes of are typically defined in the object model as read-write. 这样就可以在实例初始化后进行调整。This is so they can be adjusted after initialization of the instance. 但是，在对、或的调用中使用元数据后 ， 属性系统将密封传递元数据的详细信息的元数据实例和属性现在被视为不可变。However, after the metadata is consumed as part of a call to , , or , the property system will seal that metadata instance and properties that convey the specifics of the metadata are now considered immutable. `true` 在此元数据实例上尝试设置此属性后，将引发异常。Attempting to set this property after is `true` on this metadata instance will raise an exception. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 此类的成员通常不在中使用 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 。Members of this class are not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性值继承是 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] WPF 框架级别的属性系统的一项功能，因此，某些依赖属性可以在元素树的根或附近的元素上本地设置， [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 然后将其值继承给同样具有该属性的子元素的逻辑树中的所有元素。Property value inheritance is a feature of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] property system at the WPF framework level, whereby certain dependency properties can be locally set on an element at or near the root of a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] element tree and then have their value inherited by all elements within the logical tree of child elements that also possess that property. 默认情况下不启用属性值继承，并且启用它确实会影响性能。Property value inheritance is not enabled by default, and enabling it does have some performance implications. 有关详细信息，请参阅[属性值继承](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/property-value-inheritance)。For details, see [Property Value Inheritance](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/property-value-inheritance). > [!NOTE] > 尽管属性值继承可能看不到非附加依赖项属性，但通过运行时树中的某些对象-对象分段不确定非附加属性的继承行为。Although property value inheritance might appear to work for nonattached dependency properties, the inheritance behavior for a nonattached property through certain object-object divisions in the runtime tree is undefined. 始终使用 来注册在 元数据中指定的属性。Always use to register properties where you specify in the metadata. 派生类上的属性 通常在对象模型中定义为可读写。Properties on derived classes of are typically defined in the object model as read-write. 这样就可以在实例初始化后进行调整。This is so they can be adjusted after initialization of the instance. 但是，在对、或的调用中使用元数据后 ， 属性系统将密封传递元数据的详细信息的元数据实例和属性现在被视为不可变。However, after the metadata is consumed as part of a call to , , or , the property system will seal that metadata instance and properties that convey the specifics of the metadata are now considered immutable. `true` 在此元数据实例上尝试设置此属性后，将引发异常。Attempting to set this property after is `true` on this metadata instance will raise an exception. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 此类的成员通常不在中使用 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 。Members of this class are not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. ## Examples 下面的示例从各种依赖属性字段获取默认元数据，查询 其上各种属性的值，并使用该信息来填充表以实现 "元数据浏览器"。The following example obtains the default metadata from various dependency property fields, queries the value of various properties on it, and uses the information to populate a table to implement a "metadata browser". remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性报告 `false` 两个可能条件之一：不允许将数据绑定到依赖项属性，因为依赖属性是只读的 (如依赖项属性标识符中所报告的，) 而不是在 `true` 此元数据中将其他元数据属性的值设置为。This property reports `false` for one of two possible conditions: either data binding to a dependency property is not allowed because the dependency property is read-only (as reported in the dependency property identifier, not the metadata), or the value of another metadata property, , is set to `true` in this metadata. 此属性是为了方便起见而公开的，因此调用方不必同时检查 和 。This property is exposed as a convenience so that callers do not have to check both and . 如果尝试创建的元数据指定另一个读/写属性不应支持数据绑定，则指定标志 (注意与) 稍有不同的命名约定差异 。If you are attempting to create metadata that specifies that an otherwise read/write property should not support data binding, specify the flag (note the slight naming convention difference versus ). ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 此类的成员通常不在中使用 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 。Members of this class are not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. ## Examples 下面的示例从各种依赖属性字段获取默认元数据，查询 其上各种属性的值，并使用该信息来填充表以实现 "元数据浏览器"。The following example obtains the default metadata from various dependency property fields, queries the value of various properties on it, and uses the information to populate a table to implement a "metadata browser". [!code-csharp[PropertySystemEsoterics#DPGetMetadataSingle](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertySystemEsoterics/CSharp/XAMLAPP/page2.xaml.cs#dpgetmetadatasingle)] [!code-vb[PropertySystemEsoterics#DPGetMetadataSingle](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertySystemEsoterics/visualbasic/xamlapp/page2.xaml.vb#dpgetmetadatasingle)] [!code-csharp[PropertySystemEsoterics#FPMProperties](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertySystemEsoterics/CSharp/XAMLAPP/page2.xaml.cs#fpmproperties)] [!code-vb[PropertySystemEsoterics#FPMProperties](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertySystemEsoterics/visualbasic/xamlapp/page2.xaml.vb#fpmproperties)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，无论是读写属性，此元数据属性都设置为 `true` 专用于不支持数据绑定的属性。Note that this metadata property is set to `true` specifically for properties that should not support data binding, despite being read-write properties. 预期是，在大多数情况下，如果声明了依赖属性，则需要进行数据绑定，因为数据绑定是依赖属性有用的关键方案之一。The expectation is that in most cases where a dependency property is declared, data binding is desired, because data binding is one of the key scenarios where a dependency property is useful. 与不同的是 ，这并不只是更改稍后可在特定绑定上更改的默认值。Unlike , this does not merely change a default that can later be changed on a specific binding. 如果在 `true` 元数据中为依赖属性元数据设置此属性，则将禁止所有绑定通过表达式将其值应用于该依赖属性。Setting this property `true` in the metadata for a dependency property metadata will disable all bindings from applying their values through expressions to that dependency property. 只读依赖属性不支持数据绑定 (因为它们没有可应用更改值) 的 setter，但仍会报告 `false` 。Read-only dependency properties do not support data binding (because they have no setter that can apply changed values), but will still report `false` for . 这是因为对应于值的属性 将报告与实际建立元数据的方式的奇偶校验，而不是始终报告属性命名可能表示的最终结果行为。This is because properties that correspond to a values will report parity with how the metadata was actually established, rather than always reporting the end result behavior that the naming of the property might imply. 若要确定给定的依赖属性是否允许数据绑定，通常应改为勾选 。To determine whether a given dependency property permits data binding, you should usually check instead. 对于将和作为单个操作进行检查，是一种方便的方法，它将 生成预期结果。 is a convenience for checking both and as a single operation, yielding the expected result. 派生类上的属性 通常在对象模型中定义为可读写。Properties on derived classes of are typically defined in the object model as read-write. 这样就可以在实例初始化后进行调整。This is so they can be adjusted after initialization of the instance. 但是，在对、或的调用中使用元数据后 ， 属性系统将密封传递元数据的详细信息的元数据实例和属性现在被视为不可变。However, after the metadata is consumed as part of a call to , , or , the property system will seal that metadata instance and properties that convey the specifics of the metadata are now considered immutable. `true` 在此元数据实例上尝试设置此属性后，将引发异常。Attempting to set this property after is `true` on this metadata instance will raise an exception. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 此类的成员通常不在中使用 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 。Members of this class are not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写元数据时，将在内部使用此方法。This method is used internally when metadata is being overridden.

para.span: 派生自 (或此类) 的类应重写此方法，以考虑它们在实现中添加的任何元数据属性。

span.span: Classes that derive from (or this class particularly) should override this method to account for any metadata properties they have added in their implementations.

para.span: 例如，你的实现可能已添加了一个新的 flagwise 枚举值， 然后实现应能够正确组合这些标志。

span.span: For instance, your implementation might have added a new flagwise enumeration value, and the implementation should then be able to combine those flags correctly.

para.span: 在您自己的实现之前始终调用基实现，因为基实现负责合并已在层次结构中的以前类型上定义的所有属性。

span.span: Always call the base implementation prior to your own implementation, because the base implementation takes care of merging all the properties already defined on previous types in the hierarchy.

para.span: 中由实现添加的行为 是，元数据中的特定 WPF 框架级属性（如）在 位或运算中组合在一起。

span.span: The behavior added by the implementation in is that specific WPF framework-level properties in the metadata such as are combined in a bitwise or operation.

para.span: 当你通过调用来重写现有依赖属性的属性元数据时，该行为还实现了此行为 ，并使用了替代元数据（即） 。

span.span: The behavior also implements the behavior when you override the property metadata on an existing dependency property by calling , using override metadata that is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此元数据可报告极少应用于跨特殊父元素-子元素边界的属性值继承行为的修改。This metadata reports a seldom-applied modification to property value inheritance behavior across special parent element-child element boundaries. 此类边界的规范示例是的内容 ，其中的 内容可能会独立于存在而重新加载 。The canonical example of such a boundary is the contents of a , where the content might get reloaded independently of the existence of the . 所需的属性系统行为是属性值继承不应遍历的内容 ，因为这些内容可能是承载框架的应用程序不拥有或控制的元素。The desired property system behavior is that property value inheritance should not traverse into the contents of the , because these contents might be elements that the application hosting the frame does not own or control. 如果将设置为的元数据指定为 `true` ，并 将指定为 `true` ，将导致应用元数据的属性即使在 边界或类似边界内可继承。Specifying metadata with set to `true`, as well as specifying as `true`, will cause the property on which the metadata is applied to be inheritable even across the boundary or similar boundaries. 派生类上的属性 通常在对象模型中定义为可读写。Properties on derived classes of are typically defined in the object model as read-write. 这样就可以在实例初始化后进行调整。This is so they can be adjusted after initialization of the instance. 但是，在对、或的调用中使用元数据后 ， 属性系统将密封传递元数据的详细信息的元数据实例和属性现在被视为不可变。However, after the metadata is consumed as part of a call to , , or , the property system will seal that metadata instance and properties that convey the specifics of the metadata are now considered immutable. `true` 在此元数据实例上尝试设置此属性后，将引发异常。Attempting to set this property after is `true` on this metadata instance will raise an exception. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 此类的成员通常不在中使用 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 。Members of this class are not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此元数据选项与作为引用类型的依赖项属性相关，其中，该类型具有其自己的属性值。This metadata option is pertinent for dependency properties that are reference types, where that type has property values of its own. 通常，布局系统逻辑假设具有子属性的任何依赖属性可能会影响布局，因为检查更改的所有子属性比实际运行另一个呈现处理的时间更长。Typically, the layout system logic is to assume that any dependency property with sub-properties potentially will affect layout, because checking all sub-properties for changes is more time consuming than actually running another render pass. 将此选项设置为 `true` 对于优化 WPF 框架级别布局系统实现的性能十分有用。Setting this option to `true` is useful for optimizing performance of the WPF framework level layout system implementation. 派生类上的属性 通常在对象模型中定义为可读写。Properties on derived classes of are typically defined in the object model as read-write. 这样就可以在实例初始化后进行调整。This is so they can be adjusted after initialization of the instance. 但是，在调用、或的过程中使用元数据后 ， 属性系统将密封传递元数据的详细信息的元数据实例和属性现在被视为不可变。However, once the metadata is consumed as part of a call to , , or , the property system will seal that metadata instance and properties that convey the specifics of the metadata are now considered immutable. `true` 在此元数据实例上尝试设置此属性后，将引发异常。Attempting to set this property after is `true` on this metadata instance will raise an exception. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 此类的成员通常不在中使用 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 。Members of this class are not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
